# Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```

## Introduction

This dashboard explores Pokemon stat design across generations using the 01-04-25 TidyTuesday dataset.

```{r load_dataset, include=FALSE}
pokemon_df <- read_csv("data/pokemon_df.csv")
```

```{r stat_distribution, echo=FALSE}
df_long <- pokemon_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(hp, attack, defence, special_attack, special_defence, speed),
    names_to = "stat",
    values_to = "value"
  )
```
